description:
What business are you trying to promote? What area do you want to research? Think of a general keyword that expresses your business, your service, or even the niche that you want to figure out if it is profitable.

Google Keyword Planner can help you because when you get into the Google keyword tool you can find all the data you need. 

In this course, you will learn how to utilize Google Keyword Planner to get keywords and then use them to do SEO so that you can rank on Google, or you might use them to do Market Research to understand the potentials of a new product or service you would like to promote.

Google AdWords Keyword Planner is not just for AdWords, but it is a general-purpose Keyword Research tool.
title: Best Keywords for SEO and Market Research
